title: Da Vinci Payer Coverage Decision Exchange (PCDE) FHIR IG
introduction:
This implementation guide defines a mechanism for sharing information from an 'original' payer to a 'new' payer when a patient has switched plans to help ensure continuity of care and reduce/eliminate the need for repeating lab or diagnostic tests, re-trying previous therapies, etc.

The DaVinci PCDE IG is targeted to FHIR R4

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)
